refsect1.title: Preliminaries
refsect1.para: In order to run this example you need two Virtuoso servers running (publisher and subscriber). In the example scripts it is assumed that the first Virtuoso server (publisher) is running at localhost:1111 and the second Virtuoso server (subscriber) is running at localhost:1112. If you are running ODBC versions of the servers there should be 2 ODBC DSN's records named "localhost:1111" and "localhost:1112".

refsect1.title: Example creating a subscription
refsect1.para: These steps should be executed on subscriber.

orderedlist.listitem: Login to the Conductor UI using the dba account.
Go to the "Replication" tab, then go to the "Transactional" tab and then go the "Subscriptions" sub-tab.
Select connected DSN from the list and then press "Publications list" button. If the desired DSN is not connected yet you can connect to it using "Specify new data source" dialog below.
Select a publication and press "List items" button.
Press "Subscribe" button. You can optionally load initial data by checking "Load data" checkbox.
